channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Learn_python3
item.description: 学习learn python 3 hard way 时踩到的一些坑： ex49: def peek(word_list): if word_list: # this gives me trouble word = word_list[0] return word[0] else: return None if word_list 不为空，则返回true Because of the implicit booleanness of the empty list is quite pythonic strings of length >= 1 are Truthy. empty strings are Falsy. lists of length >= 1 are Truthy. None is Falsy. 在python3.7中，只要函数没有写return，则其返回值默认为none嗷 哪怕调用其他函数,其他函数会执行，但是返回值还是none 例子： def match(): print(“MATCH OPERATE”) return 99 def skip(): match()

item.title: The Road Not Taken
item.description: BY ROBERT FROST Two roads diverged in a yellow wood, And sorry I could not travel both And be one traveler, long I stood And looked down one as far as I could To where it bent in the undergrowth; Then took the other, as just as fair, And having perhaps the better claim, Because it was grassy and wanted wear; Though as for that the passing there Had worn them really about the same,
